answers.answer: I have a feeling this is due to blood pressure xxxx might wanna get yourself a check up tomorrow xxxx just to be on the safe side xxxx good luck xxxx
Have you had your BP checked? Generally a headache and spots in your vision are related to high BP, but it could also be due to a few other problems, such as preeclampsia.
I have a feeling this is due to blood pressure xxxx might wanna get yourself a check up tomorrow xxxx just to be on the safe side xxxx good luck xxxx

Definitely could be blood pressure-related, but it also occurs with migraines which can occur throughout pregnancy.Either way, since this seems to be new for you I would absolutely call the doctor immediately and ask what they want you to do.
Its midnight here and i have migraine problem even before pregnancy.i will call my doctor in morning..i hope everything is fine :/

Should be ok to wait a few more hours to call, I'm sure things are fine try not to worry. just make sure and remind them about your migraine history - my migraines intensified to the point where I was losing my vision for hours every day and I was going numb from neck to forehead when I was in my 3rd trimester with my son...and it can be scary but it's just one of those wonderful side effects of pregnancy for some of us.If it is blood pressure they can help control that with medication as well.in the meantime, if the pain becomes unbearable, the vision disturbances become severe or your vision blacks out, or you feel like you can't catch your breath or you feel like there's a lot of pressure in your face or head (hard to describe but it's like when you run really fast in the heat and your head pounds really hard from the blood flow) I'd go get checked tonight, otherwise call first thing in the morning and ask.best of luck hon
Yes i am having breathlessnesss,very fast thumping like heartbeat n my head pounds...
Also i m feeling pressure at the back of my head..
It wouldn't hurt to give your local hospital a call or just go in to be looked at. If this is all recent, it should be checked out.
I agree with Clysta it may be nothing but better safe than sorry.

question: I m 30 weeks prego n today i m having headache n also i see silverish dots flying iny sight..anyone knows wats this???
title: flash n headache
